location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'GENERAL MAP OF BAHRAIN ISLAND. PERSIAN GULF'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: blueprintDimensions: 2120 x 830mm, on sheet 2220 x 880mm

mods.abstract: General map of Bahrain Island, produced by the Bahrain Petroleum Company (BAPCO).The map shows:Shaikh of Bahrain's private property, excluded from the Company's ConcessionvillagesgardensCompany reservationsroadssalt marshesancient burial groundssand duneswater wellsfencingoil lineswell water linescondensed water linessewer linesgas linestelephone linespower lineslocationsabandoned locationsrig completeddrilling welldrilling well abandonedproducing oil wellThe map supersedes map F-956, dated 21 May 1934.
